content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s nigh aran 1 100% cashmere yarn each skein of this worsted/aran-weight yarn is 100 yards/ 55 grams approximately 160 total yards required we used the color flannel suit - us 8 5 mm 16-inch circular knitting needles 2 - a stitch marker 3 - stitch holders 4 or scrap yarn gauge 20 stitches and 34 rounds = 4 inches in stitch pattern size - finished circumference at top 17½ inches - finish width at each bottom edge 7 inches - finished height 10 inches pattern designed and written by purl soho designer gianna mueller 5 see even more of gianna s work on her instagram 6 1 https //www purlsoho com/nigh-aran html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_holders html 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 6 https //www instagram com/giannaknits/
